name: How many full hours in a given number of minutes
instruction:
Write a function `howManyHours`.

The function takes one number - the number of minutes, it returns the number of full hours that this number of minutes contains.

Examples of running the function:
```javascript.
howManyHours(59) // 0
howManyHours(60) // 1
howManyHours(90) // 1
howManyHours(120) // 2
howManyHours(121) // 2
howManyHours(122) // 2
```
